name: Downward Dog
description:
Created for the Ludum Dare 48 jam, theme of "Deeper and deeper".

Dig into the earth and collect bones while avoiding hazards and enemies. Use bones to purchase upgrades and bombs to aid in your adventure.

Supports keyboard and gamepad (menus don't work fully with gamepad):

  • WASD / Left Stick / D-Pad: Move and dig
  • Space / A (Xbox) / X (PlayStation): Use bomb
  • Press Down to purchase an item from the shop

Contributors:

  • Roy Filipchuk (sgtscum): Programming
  • Taylor Van Dommelen (vincinerated): Art and programming
  • Royalty free music by Rafael Krux
